The previous fifty-three sÅ«tras
Are all called deviant from the truth.
Some begin with the golden words of the Buddha,
But end with heretical prophecies.
Some discuss worldly techniques,
And later use Buddhist terms.ğŸ”½Some cite the auspicious and inauspicious of yin and yang,
Some clarify the blessings and misfortunes of spirits and ghosts.
All of these are like this.
The falsehoods are obvious.
